Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers

Class FavouriteController

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers.FavouriteController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/users") @Validated(OrderedValidation.class) public class FavouriteController extends Object
REST controller for endpoints related to favourites

    • getFavourites

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping("/{userID}/favourites") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<FavouriteReadDTO>> getFavourites(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=UserRepository.class,message="User with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a list of favourites for a specific user
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user whose favourites are to be retrieved
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of favourites for the specified user

    • addFavourite

      @IsAdmin @PostMapping("/{userID}/favourites") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FavouriteReadDTO> addFavourite(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=UserRepository.class,message="User with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID, @RequestBody @Valid @UniqueCompositeFields(repository=FavouriteRepository.class,methodName="existsByUser_IdAndBook_Id",pathVariable="userID",dtoClass=FavouriteWriteDTO.class,dtoFieldName="bookID",message="This book is already in the user\'s favourites",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Valid FavouriteWriteDTO favouriteWriteDTO)
      Adds a new favourite book for a specific user
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user to whom the favourite belongs
      favouriteWriteDTO - the favourite book to be added
      Returns:
      the created favourite

    • deleteFavourite

      @IsAdmin @DeleteMapping("/{userID}/favourites/{bookID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteFavourite(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID, @PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsCompositeResource(repository=FavouriteRepository.class,methodName="existsByUser_IdAndBook_Id",firstPathVariable="userID",secondPathVariable="bookID",message="The book with the given ID is not in the given user\'s favourites",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer bookID)
      Deletes a favourite book for a specific user
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user whose favourite is to be deleted
      bookID - the ID of the favourite book to be deleted
      Returns:
      a response entity with no content

    • getFavourites

      Retrieves the favourites of the currently authenticated user
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a page of favourites for the authenticated user

    • addFavourite

      @PostMapping("/me/favourites") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FavouriteReadDTO> addFavourite(@RequestBody @UniqueCompositeFields(repository=FavouriteRepository.class,methodName="existsByUser_IdAndBook_Id",usePathVariable=false,dtoClass=FavouriteWriteDTO.class,dtoFieldName="bookID",message="This book is already in your favourites",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) FavouriteWriteDTO favouriteWriteDTO)
      Adds a new favourite book for the currently authenticated user
      Parameters:
      favouriteWriteDTO - the favourite book to be added
      Returns:
      the created favourite

    • deleteFavourite

      @DeleteMapping("/me/favourites/{bookID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteFavourite(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsCompositeResource(repository=FavouriteRepository.class,methodName="existsByUser_IdAndBook_Id",useJWT=true,secondPathVariable="bookID",message="The book with the given ID is not in your favourites",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer bookID)
      Deletes a favourite book for the currently authenticated user
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the favourite book to be deleted
      Returns:
      a response entity with no content
